channel.title: Drafts on tdoot's odd little bazaar

item.title: Now Listening - Early October 2022
item.description: King Buffalo - Regenerator Rickshaw Billie’s Burger Patrol - Doom Wop Psychedelic/stoner/doom metal. King Buffalo is more psychedelic, while Rickshaw Billie’s Burger Patrol is in-your-face gravely metal fronted by a dude who plays the hell out of an 8-string guitar. And they’re from Austin!
